Articles.Content:
Have you been yearning for a Long-Range, easy to fly, awsome looking Plane?

Well you came to the right place!

ZodiaK industries presents... The ScoutR!

This amazing all in one craft Is a must-have for any aspiring homeworld explorer!

With great range, It can take you all the way to the poles and back!

BUT WAIT- there's more!

When you order one ScoutR, we'll give you a free Rovee rover, Free of charge!

Now you can rule the heavens and the ground, courtesey of ZodiaK industries!

All this can be yours for one easy payment of 1,000 KerBucks, Or 4 monthly payments of 250 KerBucks!

FLIGHT NOTES

1. right-click on probe core (just after intake) and select "control from here"

2. turn on SAS

3.turn on fine control

4.pledge your soul to ZodiaK Ind.

5.???

6.Profit! (for us, that is!)

Pics: http://imgur.com/a/6t2sK#0

ScoutR download: http://www./download/pvfo4inzfe8nsbi/ScoutR.craft

Rovee download: http://www./download/6d1kj9jk98zfjix/Rovee.craft

warranty void if placed on runway.

Edited September 2, 2013 by ZodiaK
forgot flight notes

OVER 9000!

ZodiaK. But seriously. what's a power level?

2080 capacity, powered by 2 RTGs. ZodiaK Ind. Ensures that exploration is never held up by petty things like electric charge.

ZodiaK. Customer support is gratifying!

Because flying a plane with two RTGs on your sides is perfectly normal.

Great plane.

Does anyone have any thoughts on the Rovee?

I threw it in there on the fly, and it's fairly generic.

I may replace the packaged rover some time, Unless anyone actually likes It

ZodiaK. Options are there... or not

ultimately maybe
I will dl and give it a fly after work.

If one likes the craft, Tell us!

If one hates it, Tell us in the form of constructive criticism!

I just wish that more people would tell us about their experiences with The ScoutR!

ZodiaK. Please input!
I will try when my computer is fixed and I have KSP up and running.
The ScoutR has been rereleased by arcadia industries. take a look here!
Quite a nice plane. Reminds me of the spirit of St. Louis type due to cockpit positioning.
To embed your album, type (imgur)the link to your album(imgur) and replace () with []
